DOC.brief_summary: In vitro maturation of oocytes after minimal gonadotropin stimulation in patients with polycystic ovaries, to prevent cases of ovarian hyperstimulation.
DOC.brief_title: Invitro Maturation of Oocytes for Patients With Polycystic Ovaries
DOC.criteria: Polycystic ovaries Needing IVF for fertility treatment Age above 39
